aclu_visual_language_core.text: bold colorful dynamic, firm convictions bold defiant statements, resolute patriotic historic serious layered together

aclu_photography_style.text: documentary-style photography, portraits of real people, candid photos everyday citizens, on-the-ground documentation, natural settings lighting, frank unposed expressions

aclu_modern_engraving.text: modern engraving treatment, distinctive stylization, two colors with contrast, visual treatment variety

aclu_color_primary.text: ACLU red ef404e, ACLU blue 0055aa, red something else and blue, principal colors strength urgency trust stability

aclu_color_light_palette.text: light yellow ffe06a, light pink fabeaf, light orange fcaa17, light azure a3dbe3, light green a7d7b5

aclu_color_dark_palette.text: black 000000, dark gray 3c3532, dark green 00343a, dark navy 130f54, dark burgundy 691b40, dark purple 552564

aclu_composition_rules.text: one central visual element, bottom three-quarters layout, asymmetrical arrangements contemporary, layering richness depth, angled elements energy

aclu_format_constraints.text: square 1080x1080, vertical 1080x1620, horizontal 1620x1080, artwork zone bottom, header zone empty for text
